title: Bypass: the story of a patient
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cardiac diseases

description: The true story of a heart patient from the advanced stages of his disease where coronary bypass surgery is his only alternative. The surgery is shown as is his convalescence. The film gives viewers a firsthand look at what is involved in bypass surgery and helps to alleviate fears.
